SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.actors

Interface Destructible

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActiveActorDestructible, BasicFighterPlane, BossPlane, BossProjectile, EnemyPlane, EnemyProjectile, FighterPlane, PowerUp, Projectile, SpreadshotPowerUp, UserPlane, UserProjectile
public interface Destructible
Represents an entity in the game that can take damage and be destroyed. Classes implementing this interface must provide logic for taking damage and being destroyed.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    destroy()
    Handles the logic for destroying the object.
    void
    takeDamage()
    Handles the logic for when the object takes damage.

  • Method Details

    • takeDamage

      void takeDamage()
      Handles the logic for when the object takes damage. Implementing classes should define how damage is applied.

    • destroy

      void destroy()
      Handles the logic for destroying the object. Implementing classes should define what happens when the object is destroyed.
